cases.feature_name: Jellybean parental consent flow for EU users
cases.feature_description: Implementation of parental consent mechanism using our Jellybean system to comply with DSA requirements for users under 18 in European Union territories. Uses ASL logic to verify age before content access.
cases.test_reasoning: Clear legal terminology with specific regulation reference and age-related controls

cases.feature_name: Snowcap minor verification for CA SB-976
cases.feature_description: Deploying Snowcap policy framework to implement minor verification checks for California users. System blocks addictive features during school hours and implements usage time limits per SB-976 requirements. DRT set to 30 days for compliance logs.
cases.test_reasoning: Multiple compliance signals with specific regulation citation and control types

cases.feature_description: Automated detection system that identifies potential child sexual abuse material and triggers mandatory reporting to NCMEC within 24 hours as required by federal law. EchoTrace logs maintained for audit purposes.
cases.test_reasoning: Clear CSAM reporting requirement with specific legal obligation

cases.feature_description: Automated system for processing copyright takedown requests in EU territories per DSA notice and action requirements. Implements GH-based routing to ensure local compliance policy (LCP) adherence.
cases.test_reasoning: Copyright compliance with geographic routing for legal requirements

cases.feature_description: A/B testing new personalized feed (PF) algorithm optimizations for Korean market. Feature rollout (FR) limited to 10% of KR users to measure engagement metrics. Spanner rules route traffic appropriately.
cases.test_reasoning: Clear A/B test language with market experimentation focus, no legal compliance signals

cases.feature_description: Trial run of new creator monetization features in Japan market. Testing payment processing improvements and reward distribution mechanisms. GH handles regional routing for this market experiment.
cases.test_reasoning: Business experimentation with creator payments, no legal compliance context

cases.feature_description: New video enhancement filter available globally except in Germany. Feature uses advanced AI processing and is currently blocked in DE region via GH routing. No specific rationale documented.
cases.test_reasoning: Geographic exclusion without clear legal rationale - needs human review

cases.feature_description: Implementing 90-day DRT for French user data with automatic deletion. Policy applies only to France-based users. Compliance team requested this implementation but legal basis not specified in current documentation.
cases.test_reasoning: Data retention suggests compliance but lacks clear legal citation

cases.feature_name: EU mood-based content with minor safeguards
cases.feature_description: A/B testing mood-based PF algorithm in EU with special ASL protections for underage users. Trial includes both market research components and mandatory age verification per local compliance requirements. Jellybean system handles the minor protection logic.
cases.test_reasoning: Despite A/B test language, includes clear legal compliance requirements for minors

cases.feature_name: Florida gaming features with parental controls
cases.feature_description: Rolling out new gaming integration features in Florida with enhanced parental consent mechanisms. While primarily a market expansion, includes mandatory compliance with FL minor protection laws including usage time limits and content filtering.
cases.test_reasoning: Business expansion that includes mandatory legal compliance components

cases.feature_description: Feature flagged for redline review due to potential UT-SMRA implications. Implements softblock functionality for users flagged as NR in Utah region. CDS system monitors for compliance violations with IMT triggers active.
cases.test_reasoning: Heavy jargon but clear Utah regulation reference and compliance monitoring

cases.feature_name: Glow compliance status for T5 data
cases.feature_description: System implements Glow flagging for Tier 5 sensitivity data handling in EEA regions. EchoTrace monitoring active with NSP policy enforcement. ShadowMode deployment for initial compliance verification before full rollout.
cases.test_reasoning: High sensitivity data handling in EU region suggests GDPR/DSA compliance

cases.feature_description: A/B testing age-appropriate theme variations for different user demographics across global markets. Testing how users of different age groups respond to UI themes. No actual age verification or legal requirements involved.
cases.test_reasoning: Contains 'age' terminology but is purely UX testing, not legal compliance

cases.feature_description: Testing minor adjustments to the main feed layout algorithm. Small variant test to optimize user engagement through subtle interface changes. Feature uses standard A/B testing methodology.
cases.test_reasoning: 'Minor' refers to small changes, not underage users - should not trigger false positive

cases.feature_description: Feature processes user data across multiple EEA countries with automatic data localization per GDPR requirements. Implements region-specific DRT policies and cross-border transfer restrictions. BB monitoring detects compliance anomalies.
cases.test_reasoning: Multi-jurisdiction data handling with clear GDPR/DSA compliance requirements

cases.feature_description: Automated reporting system that generates different compliance reports for California, Florida, and Utah based on respective state laws. System handles CA-SB976 addiction metrics, FL minor usage data, and UT social media compliance statistics.
cases.test_reasoning: Multi-state compliance reporting with specific regulation references

cases.feature_name: Compliance system with vague legal reference
cases.feature_description: Feature implements various user protections in response to 'regulatory requirements' in EU region. Includes age-related checks and content filtering but specific laws not clearly identified. Legal team indicated compliance necessary.
cases.test_reasoning: Vague legal reference should result in low confidence and REVIEW decision

cases.feature_description: Mandatory CSAM detection and reporting system per 18 U.S.C. § 2258A requirements. Automatically reports suspected child sexual abuse material to National Center for Missing & Exploited Children within legally required timeframe. EchoTrace audit logs maintained.
cases.test_reasoning: Explicit legal citation and clear NCMEC reporting should yield high confidence

test_objectives: Validate positive case detection with clear legal signals
Test negative case identification for business geofencing
Check ambiguous case handling and REVIEW decision logic
Verify jargon expansion and terminology understanding
Test edge cases with mixed business/legal signals
Validate confidence scoring and evidence extraction
Test false positive resistance with misleading terminology
